author: Godspower Owie
title: Bitcoin's Funding Rates See Sharp Decrease, Is Market Activity Cooling Off? - 'Bitcoinist' News Summary (Hungary) | BEAMSTART
text:
Quick Summary: Recent declines in Bitcoin’s price have been followed by negative sentiment across several on-chain metrics that are crucial in determining its next trajectory.
With key metrics witnessing a decrease, there are speculations that the flagship asset might see an extended drop in its price.
However, the funding rates dropped immensely, coinciding with BTC’s rejection from the $108,000 resistance level.
